name: CHIE: Too Much Energy
description:
You play as Gatoh Move and Choco Pro wrestlers Chie Koishikawa and Mei Suruga (who has fallen into a box), in a simple platformer game with two levels and an outro.
Chie collects egg tarts, whilst Mei collects apples.
There are no enemies as such, only obstacles to overcome.

CONTROLS

Chie can run everywhere, but Mei, being stuck in a box, can only movie while in the air.

KEYBOARD:
MOVE LEFT -  ⇦
MOVE RIGHT - ⇨
JUMP + Chose main menu option - SPACE
PAUSE - ENTER
Toggle fullscreen mode - ESC

XBOX CONTROLER:
MOVE LEFT or RIGHT - D-PAD
JUMP + Chose main menu option - A
PAUSE - START

PLAYSTATION CONTROLER:

MOVE LEFT or RIGHT - D-PAD
JUMP + Chose main menu option - X
PAUSE - OPTIONS

Credits:

Art, sound and music - @martyrshow (that's me).
Title screen text translation - @GizibeYun (Deepl was telling lies).

This was my first project in Pixel Game Maker MV and a real learning experience.
